metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12839 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer over-read in the getbits function insrc/libmpg123/getbits.h in mpg123 through 1.25.5 allows remote attackers tocause a possible denial-of-service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted mp3 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1+esm2
mpg123 - 1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.0-1ubuntu1.1+esm2').
